chapter.text: ondu likhita kalavannu nigadipadisade navu yava janangavannu nasa madiddilla
tanna nigadita avadhiyannu miri munnadeyalu athava adarinda hinde uliyalu yava samudayakku sadhyavagadu
avaru (dhikkarigalu) helidaru; ‘‘divya upadesa ilisi kodalagiru vavane, ninobba huccane sari
ninu satyavantanagiddare, nineke nam'ma balige malak‌galannu karetaruvudilla?’’
Nijavagi navu malak‌galannu satyadondige matra kaluhisutteve. Adare aga avarige (dhikkarigalige) heccina kalavadhi nidalaguvudilla
khanditavagiyu nave i divya bodhaneyannu ilisi kottavaru mattu khanditavagiyu nave idara sanraksakaragiddeve
Nimaginta hindina janavargagalallu navu (dutarannu) ravanisiddevu
avara balige banda dutaralli yaru apahasyakke tuttagade iralilla
i riti navu adannu (apahasyavannu) aparadhigala manas'sugalolage bittirutteve
avaru idannu (i upadesavannu) nambalararu. Aduve, hindinavara sampradayavagide
ondu vele navu avara palige akasada ondu bagilannu terediddare mattu avaru a mulaka meleruttale iddiddare –
agalu avaru, ‘‘nam'ma drstigalannu vancisalagide, nijavagi nam'mannu mantra mugdhagolisalagide’’ ende heluttiddaru
khanditavagiyu navu akasadalli tara mandalagalannu nirmisidevu mattu navu avugalannu noduvavara palige alankaravagisidevu
mattu navu avugalannu ella sapita saitanarinda suraksitavagittevu
kaddu alisalu prayatnisuvatanannu ondu ujvala benkiyu himbalisuttade
hageye navu bhumiyannu haradidevu mattu adaralli bettagalannu nettevu hagu adaralli ellavannu samarpaka pramanadalli belesidevu
adaralli navu nimagu nivu yara annadatarallavo avarigu jivanopayagalannu odagisidevu
nam'ma bali pratiyondu vastuvina bhandaragale ive. (Adare) navu avugalannu ondu nirdista pramanadalli matra ilisikodutteve
navu niru tumbida galiyannu ravanisidevu mattu navu akasadinda nirannu ilisi adannu nimage kudisidevu. Adenu nim'ma sangrahadalliralilla
khandita nave (ellarannu) jivantagolisuvavaru hagu sayisuvavaragiddeve mattu (antimavagi) nave ellara uttaradhikarigalagirutteve
nim'malli munde dati hodavarannu navu khandita ballevu mattu hinde ulidiruvavarannu navu khandita ballevu
khandita nim'ma odeyane avarellarannu ondede serisuvanu. Avanu khandita tumba yuktivantanu arivu ullavanu agiddane
Khanditavagiyu nave manavanannu kari ave mannina onagareyinda srstisiruvevu
adakkintalu munna navu tiksnavada benkiyinda jinn‌galannu srstisiddevu
nim'ma odeyanu, malak‌galodane higendiddanu; nanu kari ave mannina onagareyinda obba manavanannu srstisaliddene
nanu avanannu sajjugolisi avanalli nanna atmavannu udidaga nivu avanige sastangaveragiri
adarante, ella malak‌galu sastangaveragidaru
adare iblisana horatu. Avanu, sastanga veragidavara jote seralu nirakarisidanu
avanu (allahanu) kelidanu; o iblis, nineke sastangaveragidavara jote seralilla
avanu (iblis) helidanu; ninu avemannina onagareyinda srstisiruva manavanige sastanga veraguvavanu nanalla
avanu (allahanu) helidanu; ninu illinda tolagu. Khanditavagiyu ninu sapitanu
antima vicaraneya dinadavaregu ninna mele sapaviruvudu
avanu helidanu; ‘‘nannodeya, (ella nirjivigalannu) jivantagolisalaguva dinada tanaka nanage kalavakasavannu nidu.’’
Avanu (allahanu) helidanu; ido, ninage kalavakasa nidalagide
– ondu nirdista dinada varege
avanu (iblis) helidanu; nannodeya, ninu nannannu dari tappisiruvudarinda nanu (tappu dariyannu) bhumiyalliruvavarige candaganisuvenu mattu avarellarannu daritappisi biduvenu
avara paiki ninna ayda dasara horatu
avanu (allahanu) helidanu; idu nanna kadegiruva nera marga
khanditavagiyu a nanna dasara mele ninna adhikaravenu nadeyadu – ninnannu anusarisida darigedigala horatu
khanditavagiyu, narakave avarellarige vagdana madalada neleyagide
adakke elu bagilugaliruvavu. Pratiyondu bagiligu avarallina ondu palu nigaditavagide
dharmanistharu khandita totagalalli hagu jharigalalli iruvaru
‘‘Santiyondige hagu suraksitaragi ivugalolage pravesisiri’’ (ennutta avarannu svagatisalaguvudu)
avara edegalalli ulididda vaisamyavannella navu kittesedevu – avaru sahodararagi asanagalalli eduru baduragi kulitiruvaru
alli yava sankatavu avarannu badhisadu mattu avarannendu allinda hora hakalagadu
nanna dasarige tilisi bidiri; nanu khandita tumba ksamisuvavanu mattu tumba karunaluvendu
mattu nanna sikseyu tumba kathora sikseyagiruvudendu
ibrahimara atithigala kuritu avarige tilisiri
avaru, avara balige bandaga ‘salam’ (santi) endaru. Aga avaru (ibrahimaru), namage nim'ma kuritu atankavide endaru
avaru helidaru; atanka padabedi. Navu nimage obba jnanavanta putrana subhavarte nidutteve
avaru (ibrahim) helidaru; nivenu muditana avarisiruva nanage subhavarte niduttiruvira – adentaha subhavarte niduttiruviri nivu
avaru helidaru; navu nimage satyada subhavarte niduttiddeve. Nivu nirasara salige serabedi
avaru (ibrahim) helidaru; darigettavara horatu innaru tane tanna odeyana anugrahada bagge nirasanagaballanu
avaru (ibrahim) kelidaru; dutarugale, nim'ma honegarike enu
avaru helidaru; nam'mannu aparadhi janangadedege kalisalagide
lut‌ra maneyavara horatu – avarannella navu raksisuvevu –
adare, avara patniya horatu. Khanditavagiyu akeyu hindulidavaralli obbalagiruvalendu navu tirmanisiruvevu
konege a dutaru lut‌ra maneyavara balige bandaru
avaru (lut); nivu tira aparicitaru! Endaru
avaru helidaru; nijavagi, avaru (lut‌ra nadinavaru) yavudara kuritu sansayadalliddaro adanne (devara sikseyanne) navu tandiruvevu
mattu navu satyadondige nim'ma balige bandiruvevu – navu khandita satyavantaru

Nivu ratriya ondu hantadalli nim'ma maneyavara jote horatu hogiri mattu nivu svatah avarannu himbalisutta avara bennu bennige nadeyiri. Nim'malli yaru hindirugi nodabaradu mattu nivu nimage adesisalagiruva kadege hogiri
belagaguva hottige a janara mulavanne kadidu bidalagiruvudu emba a visayavannu navu avarige (lut‌rige) khacitavagi tilisidevu
nagaradavaru sambhramisutta bandaru
avaru (lut) helidaru; ivaru nanna atithigalu. Nivu nannannu nagepatalige gurimadabedi
mattu nivu allahanige anjiri hagu nannannu apamanisabedi
avaru (nadinavaru) helidaru; nivu sarva jagattinavara bembalakke nillabaradendu navu nim'mannu tadediralillave
avaru (lut) helidaru; nivenadaru (vivaha) madi kolluvudiddare, ido nanna putriyaru illiddare
(dutare,) nim'ma vayas'sinane, a janaru tam'ma madadalli khandita kurudagiddaru
konege, suryodayada velege ondu bhari sphotavu avarannu avarisikonditu
navu a nadannu budamelu golisibittevu mattu navu avara mele benda kanagala male surisidevu
cintane nadesuvavarige khanditavagiyu idaralli sucanegalive
adu (a nadu) ondu paricita dariyalle ide
visvasigalige khanditavagiyu idaralli sucane ide
innu, ‘aikah’ davaru khandita akramigalagiddaru
navu avara virud'dhavu pratikara tirisidevu – a eradu nadugalu heddariyalle ive
‘hijr’ emballinavaru dutarannu dhikkarisiddaru
navu avarige nam'ma aneka sucanegalannu nididevu. Adare avaru avugalannu kadeganisi bittaru
avaru nirbhitaragi parvatagalalli nivasagalannu koreyuttiddaru
(ondu dina) suryodayada velege, ondu bhari sphotavu avarannu avarisitu
avara yava sampadaneyu avara yava kelasakku baralilla
Akasagalannu hagu bhumiyannu hagu avugala naduve iruva ellavannu navu satyadondige srstisiddeve. Antima ghaligeyu khandita baralide. Nivu (janarannu) ksamisiri – adu atyanta sundara ksameyagirali
(dutare,) khanditavagiyu nim'ma odeyane mahan srstikartanu ellavannu ballavanu agiddane
khanditavagiyu navu nimage matte matte odalaguva elu vakyagalannu (prathama adhyayavannu) mattu bhavyavada kur‌anannu nidiruvevu

avarallina (dhikkarigalallina) vividha vargagalige navu enannu nidiruvevo avugaledege nivu kannettiyu nodabedi mattu nivu avara kuritu duhkhisabedi. Hageye, visvasigala palige nivu (vinayadeondige) nim'ma bhujavannu taggisidiri
mattu nivu ‘‘khanditavagiyu nanu, suspasta eccarike nidu vavanagiddene’’ endu sari bidiri
(i hinde) vibhajanavadigala mele navu (sikseyannu) eragisiddevu
avaru kur‌anannu chidragolisiddaru (tavicchisiddannu palisi, ulidudannu tiraskarisiddaru)
nim'madeyanane! Navu avarellarannu khandita prasnisuvevu –
– avaru maduttidda karmagala kuritu
nimage adesisalagiruvudannu nivu spastavagi sari bidiri mattu bahudevaradhakarannu lekkisabedi
geli maduvavara visayadalli nimage nave saku
avaru allahana jote itararannu devaragisi kondiddare. (Idara phalitansavannu) bahubegane avaru ariyuvaru
namage tilidide – avaru aduva matugalinda nim'ma manas'sige tumba sankatavaguttadendu
nivu nim'ma odeyanannu stutisutta avana pavitravannu japisiri mattu sastanga vandisuvavaragiri
innu, khacitavada a ghalige (marana) baruva tanakavu nivu nim'ma odeyana aradhane nadesiri
Bandu bittitu, allahana adesa – nivu adakkagi atura padabedi. Avanu tumba pavananu mattu avaru (avana jote) palugolisuva ellavugaligintalu avanu tumba unnatanu

‘‘nanna horatu bere yaru pujar'haralla nanage matra anjiri’’ – endu (janarannu) eccarisalikkagi avanu tanna adesadante divyavaniyannu kottu, tanna dasara paiki tanicchisidavara balige, malak‌galannu ilisikoduttane
avanu akasagalannu hagu bhumiyannu satyadondige srstisiruvanu. Avaru (avana jote) palugolisuttiruva ellavugaliginta avanu unnatanu
